page.title: 06A Girl's Day In Illogan.
page.content: I get up at 7.30am and get dressed. I wash and eat my breakfast which is toast and a drink .I then clean my teeth,get my bag and{walk to school. Before we go in we have a short play. At 9.20 we all have{assembly}in the Hall.Each week a different teacher chooses a subject and{Hymn}and children often take part.Anyone with a {Birthday}during that week has{Happy {Birthday}sung to{them.Assembly finishes at 10.00 when we all go back to our classrooms.During the morning we{do:maths,have a play and do some {English}until 11.55.We have{dinner and a play till 1.15.In the afternoons we {do Art,Project Work and Games.}We finish school at 3.30.We put our chairs up and go home. I watch{T.V.and then I go to bed and read. Some nights I go to{guides and piano lessons.
